December 24, 2024 - Kensington Computer Products Group is an American manufacturer of personal computer peripherals. The company produces peripherals including docking stations, mice, and the eponymous Kensington Lock security cable. Headquartered in Burlingame, California, Kensington is a division of ACCO Brands .
